website_summaries.verdict: Adults will definitely appreciate the "killer rabbit" aspect, while younger owners will still embrace Vicky Vicious without the feisty face gimmick.
pros: The contrast between resting and feisty face is very shocking
Still appealing in resting face mode
Bunny character popular with younger children
cons: Cheaply constructed, some premature fraying possible
Top heavy, tends to fall forward

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves her feisty pets
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves feisty pets. This one is pretty cute, but I personally find the relaxed face extra sad compared to her other feisty pets. Perhaps part of that is that is has droopy ears. It came packaged in plastic, with the ears smooshed down and we haven’t been able to coax them to stay up yet. It feels well made and works as it should. Feisty pets are not soft and huggable like your standard plushie. As long as you don’t have expectations of that, I think your little will be happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Eagle

customer_reviews.title: So entertaining!
customer_reviews.text: We have laughed so much with this bunny! They are hilarious. My husband entertained other drivers while we were stuck in traffic on a road trip - complete strangers cracked up laughing everytime! It's so unexpected to see the bunny turn evil! Absolutely love them. Bought the goat for a friend who has always wanted a goat (she loved it), and got the unicorn & pegasus for our 6 & 10 year old nieces, who find them hilarious too! They are well made and a bargain at $25 or less each.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Saved me from a ticket
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter because she is obsessed with watching it on youtube and she loves it.This silly toy even got me out of a ticket because my kid wanted to show the officer her new toy and he thought she was so cute he let me off with a warning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Funny for teens not little ones
customer_reviews.text: This is so funny. I sent it to my grand daughter she is 4 she did not like it but her parents did. This is a great Easter gift for say a teenager or tweener but not so much for little ones. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Dashford

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my granddaughter and she was thrilled! She took it to school and the point being, can't be a quiet sweetheart all the time! LoL
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Quarterly progress report reward For Girls
customer_reviews.text: For 7 & 9 year olds. They are not really snuggable as there is hard plastic inside the doll. They have some softness/plushness. The point of the doll is for play and it cracks them up as they like to surprise guests/friends with the unexpected feistiness of these pets.
customer_reviews.author: JadeRabbit

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Fun!
customer_reviews.text: I accidently left bad seller feedback and was unable to even get it changed. This is a great toy - I order 3 different ones and my Grandkids, as well as myself, love them. We can express without expressing :)
customer_reviews.author: Christine Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy for an Anime Gamer Millenial
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my young adult nephew ostensibly to go with his wizard costume at the Fanime convention every year. Everyone in the family got a kick out of this. My nephew laughed and laughed which was a good sign.
customer_reviews.author: JP KazarianTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Best gift for someone that has everything.
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure what to give a friend for Christmas so I decided to get her this. She's kind of a Sci-Fi nerd and she loved it. She has enjoyed it 10x more than I thought she would.
customer_reviews.author: The Undietaker

customer_reviews.title: Child doesn't like it, not the same as ones in store
customer_reviews.text: My 9yr old wanted this so bad, but then hasn't really played with it. Its not like the one his sister got from a store. The mouth and eyes get stuck when u squeeze it, like your suppose to do.
customer_reviews.author: April Tyler

product_meta.title: Feisty Pets Vicky Vicious Plush Stuffed Bunny
product_meta.description:
She’s cute and sweet, but she'll turn on you if you squeeze her! Vicky was captured only after destroying a quarter of the crops in Kansas. Vicky is extremely fast and will chew on anything. Be careful of your fingers and toes around Vicky, she thinks they’re carrots. Each Feisty Pet has their list of likes and dislikes, so consider yourself warned! Collect them all!! 

 Feisty Pets Vicky Vicious 

 Likes: 

Destroying Gardens Rap Music Chewing Electrical Cords 

 Dislikes:

Cartoon Characters Easter Your toes
feature_bullets: Don't let Vicky Vicious know she's just 8.5" tall unless you want her feisty!
Gently squeeze behind ears to turn your sweet-innocent pal into a feisty pet!
These endearing pets are great for cuddle time and to give your friends.
Stuffed with polyester fibers and surface washable.
Collect all the expressions to make your own stories!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars230 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
